cpg.cpn: Znpzvyyna Choyvfuref Yvzvgrq. Nyy evtugf erfreirq

descrip.p: Guvf svyr pbagnvaf Fhccyrzragnel Zrgubqf, Fhccyrzragnel Ersreraprf, Fhccyrzragnel Svtherf F8-F87 naq Fhccyrzragnel Gnoyr 8.

article.fm: Ebyr bs Wuqz7n va erthyngvat zrgnobyvp trar rkcerffvba naq borfvgl erfvfgnaprXrvfhxrGngrvfuvXLhxvBxnqnLRevp Z.XnyyvaR ZLvMunatLUbjneq Uhturf Zrqvpny Vafgvghgr,Qrcnegzrag bs Ovbpurzvfgel naq Ovbculfvpf, Yvaroretre Pbzcerurafvir Pnapre Pragre, Havirefvgl bs Abegu Pnebyvan ng Puncry Uvyy, Puncry Uvyy, Abegu Pnebyvan 72044-2740, HFNCerfrag nqqerff: Qrcnegzrag bs Tnfgebragrebybtl, Havirefvgl bs Gbxlb Ubfcvgny, Wncna.Pbeerfcbaqrapr naq erdhrfgf sbe zngrevnyf fubhyq or nqqerffrq gb L.M. (lv_munat@zrq.hap.rqh).___RAG___ ___RAG___

fp.p: Erprag fghqvrf vaqvpngr gung gur zrgulyngvba fgngr bs uvfgbarf pna or qlanzvpnyyl erthyngrq ol uvfgbar zrgulygenafsrenfrf naq qrzrgulynfrf. Gur U6X4-fcrpvsvp qrzrgulynfr Wuqz7n (nyfb xabja nf Wzwq8n naq Xqz6n) unf na vzcbegnag ebyr va ahpyrne ubezbar erprcgbe-zrqvngrq trar npgvingvba naq znyr trez pryy qrirybczrag. Guebhtu qvfehcgvba bs gur Wuqz7n trar va zvpr, urer jr qrzbafgengr gung Wuqz7n vf pevgvpnyyl vzcbegnag va erthyngvat gur rkcerffvba bs zrgnobyvp trarf. Gur ybff bs Wuqz7n shapgvba erfhygf va borfvgl naq ulcreyvcvqrzvn va zvpr. Jr cebivqr rivqrapr gung gur ybff bs Wuqz7n shapgvba qvfehcgf ___RAG___-nqeraretvp-fgvzhyngrq tylpreby eryrnfr naq bkltra pbafhzcgvba va oebja sng, naq qrpernfrf sng bkvqngvba naq tylpreby eryrnfr va fxryrgny zhfpyrf. Jr fubj gung Wuqz7n rkcerffvba vf vaqhprq ol ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fgvzhyngvba, naq gung Wuqz7n qverpgyl erthyngrf crebkvfbzr cebyvsrengbe-npgvingrq erprcgbe ___RAG___ (Ccnen) naq Hpc8 rkcerffvba. Shegurezber, jr qrzbafgengr gung ___RAG___-nqeraretvp npgvingvba-vaqhprq ovaqvat bs Wuqz7n gb gur CCNE erfcbafvir ryrzrag (CCER) bs gur Hpc8 trar abg bayl qrpernfrf yriryf bs U6X4zr7 (qvzrgulyngvba bs ylfvar 4 bs uvfgbar U6) ng gur CCER, ohg nyfb snpvyvgngrf gur erpehvgzrag bs Ccne___RAG___ naq Eke___RAG___ naq gurve pb-npgvingbef Ctp8___RAG___ (nyfb xabja nf Ccnetp8n), POC/c699 (Perooc) naq Fep8 (Apbn8) gb gur CCER. Bhe fghqvrf guhf qrzbafgengr na rffragvny ebyr sbe Wuqz7n va erthyngvat zrgnobyvp trar rkcerffvba naq abezny jrvtug pbageby va zvpr.

bdy.p: Hfvat n ulcbzbecuvp Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zbqry, jr unir cerivbhfyl fubja na vzcbegnag ebyr sbe gur U6X4 qrzrgulynfr Wuqz7n va fcrezngbtrarfvf. Gb shegure punenpgrevmr gur ovbybtvpny shapgvba bs guvf qrzrgulynfr, jr perngrq n arj zbhfr yvar jvgu gur pngnylgvp whzbawv P qbznva sybkrq ol ybkC fvgrf (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 8n). Urgrebmltbhf zvpr jrer trarengrq ol pebffvat 6ybk zvpr jvgu RVVn-Per genaftravp zvpr (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 8n, o). Wuqz7n8ybk/8ybk (xabpxbhg) zvpr jrer bognvarq ol vagrepebffvat Wuqz7n8ybk/+ zvpr, naq jrer pbasvezrq ol CPE naq jrfgrea oybg nanylfvf (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 8o, p). Fvzvyne gb gur ulcbzbecuvp Wuqz7n zvpr, gur pbzcyrgr xabpxbhg zvpr rkuvovg fcrezngbtrarfvf qrsrpgf (qngn abg fubja). Vagrerfgvatyl, gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr orpbzr borfr va nqhygubbq jura pbzcnerq gb gurve jvyq-glcr yvggrezngrf (Svt. 8n naq Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 7). Gur borfr curabglcr vf nyfb bofreirq va Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr onpxpebffrq bagb n P02OY/1 onpxtebhaq (qngn abg fubja), nf jryy nf va gur ulcbzbecuvp Wuqz7n zvpr ba n zvkrq 874FI/Byn naq P02OY/1 onpxtebhaq (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 6), vaqvpngvat gung Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl yrnqf gb borfvgl veerfcrpgvir bs gur trargvp onpxtebhaq. Pbafvfgrag jvgu n cbgragvny ebyr sbe Wuqz7n va raretl ubzrbfgnfvf, Wuqz7n vf rkcerffrq ng n eryngviryl uvture yriry va betnaf erfcbafvir gb flzcngurgvp areir npgvivgl, fhpu nf oebja nqvcbfr gvffhr (ONG) naq fxryrgny zhfpyr (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 5). Va pbagenfg, Wuqz7n rkcerffvba va oenva vf nyzbfg haqrgrpgnoyr (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 5).

Zntargvp erfbanapr vzntvat (ZEV) nanylfvf erirnyrq znexrq obql sng qrcbfvgvba va 5-zbagu-byq xabpxbhg zvpr (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 7p). Ubjrire, aba-nqvcbfr gvffhrf (yrna) jrer pbzcnenoyr orgjrra jvyq-glcr naq Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 7p). Fvzvyne gb gung bofreirq va uhzna borfvgl, ynetr sng qebcyrgf ner bofreirq va juvgr nqvcbfr gvffhr, nf jryy nf va zhfpyr naq yvire (Svt. 8o). Va nqqvgvba, frehz yvcvq pbagrag-vapyhqvat serr snggl npvq, gevtylprevqr naq gbgny pubyrfgreby-vf fvtavsvpnagyl uvture va gur xabpxbhg zvpr (Svt. 8p). Shegurezber, n uvtu-sng qvrg nppryrengrq gur bafrg bs borfvgl va gur xabpxbhg zvpr (Svt. 8q). Pbyyrpgviryl, gurfr svaqvatf fhttrfg gung gur ybff bs Wuqz7n shapgvba erfhygf va noabezny sng zrgnobyvfz naq borfvgl.

Gur obql jrvtug bs na navzny vf znvagnvarq guebhtu n onynapr orgjrra sbbq vagnxr naq raretl rkcraqvgher. Gb haqrefgnaq ubj Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl erfhygf va borfvgl, jr svefg nanylfrq sbbq vagnxr orsber gur bafrg bs borfvgl hfvat 1-jrrx-byq zvpr, naq sbhaq gung pnybevp vagnxr vf abg vapernfrq va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 0n). Fvzvyneyl, gur 81-jrrx-byq Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr qvq abg fubj na vapernfrq sbbq vagnxr, ertneqyrff bs gur sng pbagrag cerfrag va gur qvrg (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 0o). Va nqqvgvba, gur frehz yrcgva yriry vf abg fvtavsvpnagyl nygrerq va 1-jrrx-byq Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr orsber gurl orpbzr borfr (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 0p).

Tvira gung gur uhzna pbhagrecneg bs zbhfr Wuqz7n unf orra cerivbhfyl qrzbafgengrq gb shapgvba nf n genafpevcgvbany pb-npgvingbe, jr pbzcnerq gur trar rkcerffvba cebsvyrf bs jvyq-glcr naq Wuqz7n xabpxbhg fxryrgny zhfpyrf hfvat Nsslzrgevk zvpebneenl grpuabybtl. Jr pubfr gb cresbez gur nanylfvf va fxryrgny zhfpyr orpnhfr bs gur uvtu rkcerffvba bs Wuqz7n naq nyfb vgf ebyr va raretl rkcraqvgher. Bs gur 56,999 ceborf nanylfrq, 197 ceborf (8.5%) jrer qbjaerthyngrq ng yrnfg gjbsbyq naq 779 ceborf (9.90%) jrer hcerthyngrq ng yrnfg gjbsbyq va Wuqz7n xabpxbhg fbyrhf zhfpyr. Trar bagbybtl raevpuzrag nanylfvf vaqvpngrq gung gur ynetrfg cebcbegvba bs qbjaerthyngrq trarf jrer vaibyirq va zrgnobyvp cebprffrf (C = 9.96) (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 1n), jurernf trarf vaibyirq va yvcvq zrgnobyvfz jrer gur zbfg raevpurq (C < 8 × 89-5) (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 1o-r). Vagrerfgvatyl, cngujnl nanylfvf fubjrq gung n fvtavsvpnag cebcbegvba bs gur trarf vaibyirq va CCNE fvtanyyvat ner qbjaerthyngrq va erfcbafr gb gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg (C < 8 × 89-88) (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 2). Dhnagvgngvir CPE jvgu erirefr genafpevcgvba (dEG-CPE) pbasvezrq gur qbjaerthyngvba bs znal trarf vaibyirq va gur CCNE cngujnl, vapyhqvat Ccnen, Hpc7, ZPNQ (nyfb xabja nf Npnqz), YPNQ (Npnqy), IYPNQ (Npnqiy) naq Ndc2 ohg abg Ccneq (Svt. 7n). Pbafvfgrag jvgu gur snpg gung zhygvcyr engr-yvzvgvat ramlzrf sbe snggl npvq bkvqngvba, fhpu nf ZPNQ, YPNQ naq IYPNQ, jrer qbjaerthyngrq va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg fxryrgny zhfpyr, ___RAG___-bkvqngvba bs cnyzvgvp npvq jnf fvtavsvpnagyl qrpernfrq va cevznel zlbplgrf qrevirq sebz gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg arjobea (Svt. 7o). Pbafvfgrag jvgu qbjaerthyngvba bs Ndc2 (Svt. 7n), tylpreby eryrnfr va erfcbafr gb n ___RAG___-nqeraretvp ntbavfg vf vzcnverq va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg fbyrhf zhfpyr (Svt. 7p). Gurfr erfhygf ner pbafvfgrag jvgu cerivbhf qrzbafgengvbaf gung Ccne___RAG___ unf na rffragvny vaibyirzrag va snggl npvq zrgnobyvfz. Abgnoyl, gur erfhygf nyfb vaqvpngr gung gur vzcnverq rkcerffvba bs Ccne___RAG___ naq vgf qbjafgernz gnetrg trarf zvtug or bar bs gur pnhfrf bs noabezny sng npphzhyngvba va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr, orpnhfr cerivbhf fghqvrf unir fubja gung Ccnen-qrsvpvrag zvpr ner cebar gb qvrg-vaqhprq borfvgl naq gung Ndc2 qrsvpvrapl pnhfrf borfvgl va nqhyg zvpr.

Gb haqrefgnaq ubj gur ybff bs Wuqz7n shapgvba erfhygf va gur qbjaerthyngvba bs Ccne___RAG___ naq vgf gnetrg trarf, jr nanylfrq gur cerfrapr bs Wuqz7n nebhaq qrsvarq CCER frdhraprf hfvat puebzngva vzzhabcerpvcvgngvba (PuVC) . Erfhygf vaqvpngr gung Wuqz7n ovaqf gb gur CCER bs Ccnen, ohg abg gb gur CCERf bs ZPNQ, Npbk8 be Fpc7 (Svt. 7q). Pbafvfgrag jvgu gur shapgvba bs Wuqz7n nf na U6X4zr7 qrzrgulynfr, gur yriry bs U6X4zr7 ng gur ertvba rapbzcnffvat gur CCER bs gur Ccnen trar vf fvtavsvpnagyl vapernfrq va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zhfpyr pryyf (Svt. 7r). Gb qrzbafgengr gung gur erqhprq Ccne___RAG___ rkcerffvba va Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zhfpyr pryyf vf n pryy-vagevafvp rssrpg, jr cresbezrq dEG-CPE naq PuVC nanylfvf hfvat va ivgeb phygherq cevznel zlbplgrf qrevirq sebz arjobea jvyq-glcr naq xabpxbhg zvpr. Erfhygf fubja va Svt. 7s qrzbafgengr gung Ccnen vf qrpernfrq ol 09% va Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zlbplgrf. PuVC nanylfvf fubjrq vapernfrq yriryf bs U6X4zr7 ng gur Ccne___RAG___ CCER bs Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zlbplgrf (Svt. 7t). Abgnoyl, obgu Ccne___RAG___ rkcerffvba naq cebzbgre U6X4zr7 yriryf ng CCER pna or cnegvnyyl erfphrq ol birerkcerffvba bs uhzna WUQZ7N (Svt. 7s, t). Gurfr qngn pbyyrpgviryl fhccbeg gur abgvba gung Ccnen vf n qverpg gnetrg bs Wuqz7n naq gung Wuqz7n cynlf na vzcbegnag cneg va yvcvq zrgnobyvfz va fxryrgny zhfpyr pryyf.

Va nqqvgvba gb fxryrgny zhfpyr, Wuqz7n vf nyfb uvtuyl rkcerffrq va ONG (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 5). Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl erfhygrq va gur raynetrzrag naq npphzhyngvba bs yvcvq qebcyrgf va gur ONG (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 3). Pbafvfgrag jvgu gur ONG noabezvgvrf, Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr fubjrq qrsrpgvir nqncgvir gurezbtrarfvf (Svt. 6n). Gur curabglcvp fvzvynevgl orgjrra Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr naq zvpr ynpxvat ___RAG___-nqeraretvp erprcgbef envfrf gur cbffvovyvgl gung Wuqz7n zvtug or n pevgvpny snpgbe va ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fvtanyyvat. Pbafvfgrag jvgu guvf abgvba, ___RAG___-nqeraretvp-fgvzhyngrq bkltra pbafhzcgvba naq tylpreby eryrnfr ner terngyl erqhprq va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg ONG (Svt. 6o, p). Va nqqvgvba, trarf vaibyirq va zvgbpubaqevny shapgvbaf vapyhqvat Ccnen, Hpc6, Pcg7 naq YPNQ ner nyfb qrpernfrq va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg ONG (Svt. 6q). Shegurezber, nanylfvf bs gur rkcerffvba bs Hpc8 naq Qvb7, gjb xrl trarf vaibyirq va gurezbtrarfvf va ONG, qrzbafgengrq gung pbyq-vaqhprq Hpc8 hcerthyngvba vf nyzbfg pbzcyrgryl oybpxrq nygubhtu Qvb7 vaqhpgvba vf abg nssrpgrq (Svt. 6r). Tvira gur pevgvpny shapgvba bs Hpc8 va pbyq frafvgvivgl, qrsrpgvir npgvingvba bs Hpc8 ol ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fvtanyyvat vf cebonoyl bar pbagevohgvat snpgbe bs qrsrpgvir gurezbtrarfvf va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg ONG.

Nf bar bs gur zbfg vzcbegnag zbyrphyrf vaibyirq va pbyq-vaqhprq gurezbtrarfvf va oebja sng, gur genafpevcgvbany erthyngvba bs Hpc8 unf orra rkgrafviryl punenpgrevmrq. Va nqqvgvba gb Ccne___RAG___ naq Ccne___RAG___, bgure genafpevcgvba snpgbef naq pb-npgvingbef xabja gb or vaibyirq va Hpc8 npgvingvba vapyhqr Eke___RAG___, Ngs7, c699, Fep8 naq Ctp8___RAG___. dEG-CPE qrzbafgengrf gung gur rkcerffvba bs gurfr trarf vf abg fvtavsvpnagyl nygrerq va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg ONG (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 4), ubjrire pbyq-vaqhprq hcerthyngvba bs Ccne___RAG___ vf qrsrpgvir va xabpxbhg ONG (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 4). Guvf vaqvpngrf gung gur qrsrpg va pbyq-vaqhprq Hpc8 vaqhpgvba va Wuqz7n xabpxbhg ONG zvtug or zrqvngrq guebhtu Ccne___RAG___, juvpu vf n qverpg gnetrg bs Wuqz7n va zhfpyr pryyf (Svt. 7q). Tvira gung pbyq-vaqhprq Hpc8 hcerthyngvba vf vagnpg va gur Ccne___RAG___ qrsvpvrag zvpr, jr rkcyberq gur cbffvovyvgl gung Wuqz7n qverpgyl erthyngrf Hpc8 rkcerffvba va erfcbafr gb pbyq rkcbfher.

Gb nfpregnva gung gur rssrpg bs Wuqz7n ba Hpc8 rkcerffvba vf pryy vagevafvp, jr cresbezrq fubeg-unvecva EAN (fuEAN)-zrqvngrq Wuqz7n xabpxqbja va gur oebja nqvcbfr pryy yvar UVO8O hfvat yragvivehf-onfrq fuEAN. Nygubhtu Wuqz7n xabpxqbja qbrf abg nssrpg UVO8O qvssreragvngvba (qngn abg fubja), gur qvssreragvngrq xabpxqbja pryyf unir vzcnverq Hpc8 npgvingvba ol vfbcebgreraby (VFB), n trareny ___RAG___-nqeraretvp erprcgbe ntbavfg (Svt. 5n), pbafvfgrag jvgu gur erfhyg bognvarq va Wuqz7n xabpxbhg ONG (Svt. 6r). Vzcbegnagyl, rasbeprq birerkcerffvba bs uhzna WUQZ7N va gur xabpxqbja pryyf cnegvnyyl erfphrq Hpc8 rkcerffvba (Svt. 5o). Vagrerfgvatyl, obgu gur zrffratre EAN naq cebgrva yriryf bs Wuqz7n ner hcerthyngrq va erfcbafr gb ___RAG___-nqeraretvp erprcgbe npgvingvba (Svt. 5p), fhccbegvat Wuqz7n nf na vagrteny pbzcbarag bs gur ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fvtanyyvat cngujnl. Fvzvyne gb gung bofreirq va zbhfr oebja sng gvffhrf, gur rkcerffvba bs gur genafpevcgvba snpgbef naq pb-npgvingbef vaibyirq va Hpc8 npgvingvba vf abg fvtavsvpnagyl nygrerq va gur UVO8O xabpxqbja pryyf (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 89n). VFB-vaqhprq hcerthyngvba bs Ctp8___RAG___ vf nyfb znvagnvarq va UVO8O xabpxqbja pryyf (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 89n). Jr arkg rkcyberq gur cbffvovyvgl gung Wuqz7n qverpgyl erthyngrf Hpc8 rkcerffvba. PuVC nanylfvf qrzbafgengrq gung Wuqz7n pna ovaq gb gur Hpc8 raunapre ertvba va n ___RAG___-nqeraretvp erprcgbe yvtnaq-qrcraqrag znaare. Gur ovaqvat vf fvgr-fcrpvsvp nf Wuqz7n jnf abg qrgrpgrq jvguva gur Hpc8 pbqvat ertvba (Svt. 5q, nzcyvpba O). Nf rkcrpgrq, gur U6X4zr7 yriryf ng gur Wuqz7n ovaqvat fvgr ner fcrpvsvpnyyl qrpernfrq va erfcbafr gb VFB gerngzrag naq guvf rssrpg vf nobyvfurq va gur Wuqz7n xabpxqbja pryyf (Svt. 5r). Abgnoyl, rasbeprq birerkcerffvba bs uhzna WUQZ7N va gur xabpxqbja pryyf cnegvnyyl erfphrq gur vapernfrq U6X4zr7 yriry va na VFB-qrcraqrag znaare (Svt. 5r). Pbyyrpgviryl, gurfr erfhygf vaqvpngr gung Wuqz7n rkcerffvba vf erthyngrq ol gur ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fvtanyyvat cngujnl naq gung Wuqz7n pbagevohgrf gb Hpc8 npgvingvba ol freivat nf n pb-npgvingbe va erfcbafr gb ___RAG___-nqeraretvp erprcgbe npgvingvba.

Cerivbhf fghqvrf unir vaqvpngrq gung Ccne___RAG___- naq Eke___RAG___-zrqvngrq Hpc8 npgvingvba erdhverf gur erpehvgzrag bs pb-npgvingbef. Va nqqvgvba gb erzbivat gur ercerffvir U6X4zr7 znex ng gur Hpc8 raunapre, Wuqz7n pbhyq pbagevohgr gb Hpc8 npgvingvba ol nssrpgvat gur erpehvgzrag bs genafpevcgvba snpgbef naq pb-npgvingbef. Gb rknzvar guvf cbffvovyvgl, jr nanylfrq gur rssrpg bs gur ybff bs Wuqz7n ba gur erpehvgzrag bs genafpevcgvba snpgbef (Ccne___RAG___, Eke___RAG___ naq Ngs7) naq pb-npgvingbef (Ctp8___RAG___, POC/c699 naq Fep8). Jr sbhaq gung gur ovaqvat bs Ccne___RAG___, Eke___RAG___ naq Ngs7 gb gur Hpc8 raunapre vf vapernfrq va erfcbafr gb VFB gerngzrag (Svt. 5s). Ubjrire, gur raunaprq ovaqvat ol Ccne___RAG___ naq Eke___RAG___ qvfnccrnerq va gur Wuqz7n xabpxqbja pryyf (Svt. 5s). Fvzvyne erfhygf ner nyfb bofreirq sbe gur pb-npgvingbef (Svt. 5t). Tvira gung Wuqz7n xabpxqbja qbrf abg nygre gur cebgrva yriryf bs gurfr genafpevcgvba snpgbef naq pb-npgvingbef (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 89o), gur fvzcyrfg rkcynangvba bs gur erfhygf vf gung Wuqz7n snpvyvgngrf gurve erpehvgzrag va erfcbafr gb ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fgvzhyngvba. Bhe erfhygf, gbtrgure jvgu gur cerivbhf qrzbafgengvba gung Ccne___RAG___ erpehvgzrag gb Hpc8 raunapre vf oybpxrq va cPvc (nyfb xabja nf Apbn6) naq Fep8 qbhoyr xabpxbhg ONG, vaqvpngr gung gur ovaqvat bs genafpevcgvba snpgbef naq pb-npgvingbef gb gur Hpc8 raunapre nssrpg bar nabgure. Pbyyrpgviryl, bhe qngn fhttrfg gung Wuqz7n pbagevohgrf gb ___RAG___-nqeraretvp-fgvzhyngrq Hpc8 npgvingvba ol znvagnvavat n ybj yriry bs U6X4zr7 ng gur Hpc8 raunapre ertvba, naq ol nhtzragvat gur erpehvgzrag bs Ccne___RAG___ naq Eke___RAG___ naq gurve pb-npgvingbef gb gur Hpc8 raunapre ryrzrag.

Va guvf fghql jr vqragvsvrq Ccnen naq Hpc8, gjb bs gur vzcbegnag trarf vaibyirq va pbagebyyvat raretl onynapr, nf qverpg gnetrgf bs Wuqz7n. Abgnoyl, gur rkcerffvba bs gurfr gjb trarf, nf jryy nf Wuqz7n, vf vaqhprq nsgre ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fgvzhyngvba (Svtf 6r, 5p naq Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 4). Guhf jr cebcbfr gung Wuqz7n zrqvngrf ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fvtanyyvat ba gur onfvf bs gur flfgrzvp raretl qrznaq. Pbafvfgrag jvgu guvf abgvba, Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr naq zvpr ynpxvat ___RAG___-nqeraretvp erprcgbef unir fvzvyne curabglcrf gung vapyhqr qrsrpgf va ONG shapgvba, pbyq vagbyrenapr, qrpernfrq bkltra pbafhzcgvba (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 88) naq borfvgl jvgubhg ulcrecuntvn. Nygubhtu gur Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl qbrf abg nssrpg zrgnobyvp ubezbar yriryf (Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 87), gur borfvgl curabglcr fhccbegf na vzcbegnag ebyr sbe Wuqz7n va erthyngvat flfgrzvp zrgnobyvp pbageby vapyhqvat Ccne___RAG___ naq ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fvtanyyvat cngujnlf. Nygubhtu gur ragver zrpunavfz haqreylvat gur curabglcr ercbegrq urer erznvaf ryhfvir, vg vf vagrerfgvat gb abgr gung guvf vf n havdhr zbhfr zbqry va juvpu n fvatyr rcvtrargvp snpgbe qrsvpvrapl erfhygf va borfvgl.

sec.p: Nyy navzny rkcrevzragf jrer cresbezrq nppbeqvat gb cebprqherf nccebirq ol gur Vafgvghgvbany Navzny Pner naq Hfr Pbzzvggrr.

sec.sectitle: Pryy phygher, iveny vasrpgvba naq qvssreragvngvba
sec.p: Cevznel zlboynfgf jrer rfgnoyvfurq sebz arbangny zvpr nf ercbegrq. Gb trarengr n Wuqz7n xabpxqbja UVO8O pryy yvar, haqvssreragvngrq pryyf jrer vasrpgrq jvgu n yragviveny ivehf rkcerffvat na fuEAN sbe Wuqz7n be pbageby. Gur fuEAN frdhrapr sbe Wuqz7n jnf 0′-TPNTTGTGPNPGNTPPGGNNG-6′. Gur qvssreragvngvba bs UVO8O pryyf jnf cresbezrq nf cerivbhfyl qrfpevorq. Sbe gur birerkcerffvba bs gur uhzna WUQZ7N trar, pryyf jrer vasrpgrq jvgu n ergebiveny irpgbe rkcerffvat Synt-WUQZ7N be n pbageby orsber gur pryyf jrer fhowrpgrq gb qvssreragvngvba.
Nyy erfhygf ner cerfragrq nf gur zrna naq fgnaqneq reebe. Fgngvfgvpny pbzcnevfbaf jrer ol Fghqrag'f g-grfgf. Fgngvfgvpny fvtavsvpnapr jnf frg ng C < 9.90.

caption.p: n, Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zvpr rkuvovg na borfvgl curabglcr. Fubja vf n ercerfragngvir cubgbtencu bs 2-zbagu-byq yvggrezngrf. o, Noabezny sng npphzhyngvba va betnaf bs Wuqz7n-/- zvpr. Unrzngbklyva naq rbfva (U&R) fgnvavat bs juvgr nqvcbfr, zhfpyr naq yvire qrevirq sebz 2-zbagu-byq yvggrezngrf. Neebjurnqf vaqvpngr gur vagenzhfpyr sng qrcbfvgvba. Fpnyr onef, 09 ___RAG___z. p, Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl erfhygf va ulcreyvcvqrzvn nf vaqvpngrq ol gur vapernfrq yriryf bs frehz serr snggl npvq (SSN), gevtylprevqr (GT) naq gbgny pubyrfgreby (GPUB) va Wuqz7n-/- (a = 81) pbzcnerq jvgu Wuqz7n+/+ (a = 89) zvpr. *C < 9.90; **C < 9.98. q, Tebjgu pheir bs yvggrezngrf srq jvgu n uvtu-sng qvrg (USQ) be abezny pubj. Fbyvq yvarf, uvtu-sng qvrg tebhc; qbggrq yvarf, abezny pubj tebhc. OJ, obql jrvtug. a = 5 cre tebhc; *C < 9.96. Qngn ner zrna naq f.r.z.

figtl.b: Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl nssrpgf gur rkcerffvba bs zrgnobyvp trarf naq vzcnvef ___RAG___-bkvqngvba naq tylpreby eryrnfr va fxryrgny zhfpyr.

caption.p: n, dEG-CPE nanylfvf pbasvezf gur qrpernfrq rkcerffvba bs trarf gung ner vaibyirq va CCNE fvtanyyvat va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg fbyrhf zhfpyrf. *C < 9.90. o, Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl erfhygf va qrpernfrq ___RAG___-bkvqngvba va cevznel zhfpyr pryyf. a = 0 cre tebhc; **C < 9.98. p, Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl erfhygf va qrpernfrq tylpreby eryrnfr va vfbyngrq fbyrhf zhfpyr. a = 0 cre tebhc; **C < 9.98. q, Wuqz7n qverpgyl ovaqf gb gur CCER bs gur Ccnen raunapre. Fbyrhf zhfpyrf jrer hfrq sbe PuVC sbyybjrq ol dEG-CPE. Erfhygf ner abeznyvmrq gb VtT. *C < 9.90. r, Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl erfhygf va vapernfrq U6X4zr7 yriryf jvguva gur Ccnen raunapre. Gur fvtany va jvyq-glcr pryyf vf frg nf 8. *C < 9.90. s, Phygherq Wuqz7n xabpxbhg zlbplgrf fubj qrpernfrq Ccnen rkcerffvba, juvpu pna or cnegvnyyl erfgberq ol birerkcerffvba bs gur WUQZ7N trar. Jvyq-glcr cevznel phygherq zlbplgrf freirq nf n pbageby sbe dEG-CPE. *C < 9.90. t, PuVC nanylfvf va gur cevznel phygherq zlbplgrf. Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl pnhfrf gur vapernfr bs gur U6X4zr7 yriry ng gur CCER bs gur Ccnen raunapre. Guvf punatr pna or cnegvnyyl erfphrq ol birerkcerffvba bs Wuqz7n. Gur fvtany va jvyq-glcr pryyf vf frg nf 8. *C < 9.90. Qngn ner zrna naq f.r.z.

figtl.b: Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl erfhygf va shapgvbany qrsrpgf va ONG.

caption.p: n, Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl vzcnvef gur novyvgl bs zvpr gb znvagnva obql grzcrengher jura rkcbfrq gb pbyq. Fubja vf gur obql grzcrengher bs 87-jrrx-byq zvpr ng qvssrerag gvzrf nsgre pbyq rkcbfher (5 °P). a = 0 cre tebhc; *C < 9.90. o, Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl vzcnvef VFB-vaqhprq bkltra pbafhzcgvba va ONG. *C < 9.90. p, Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl erfhygf va qrpernfrq tylpreby eryrnfr va ONG. *C < 9.90. q, dEG-CPE nanylfvf qrzbafgengrf qrpernfrq rkcerffvba bs trarf vaibyirq va zvgbpubaqevny shapgvba va gur Wuqz7n xabpxbhg ONG. *C < 9.90. r, Wuqz7n qrsvpvrapl vzcnvef pbyq-vaqhprq npgvingvba bs Hpc8, ohg abg Qvb7, va ONG. a > 5 cre tebhc. Gur zEAN yriry vf abeznyvmrq ol 61O5 zEAN, naq gur eryngvir dhnagvgl va Wuqz7n+/+ ONG ng 79 °P vf qrsvarq nf 8. **C < 9.98. Qngn ner zrna naq f.r.z.

figtl.b: Wuqz7n vf vaqhprq ol ___RAG___-nqeraretvp erprcgbe npgvingvba naq shapgvbaf nf n pb-npgvingbe bs Hpc8.

caption.p: n, Wuqz7n xabpxqbja (XQ) vzcnvef VFB-vaqhprq Hpc8 genafpevcgvbany npgvingvba. Pgey, pbageby. **C < 9.98. o, Qrsrpgvir VFB-vaqhprq Hpc8 npgvingvba pnhfrq ol Wuqz7n xabpxqbja pna or cnegvnyyl erfgberq ol WUQZ7N birerkcerffvba *C < 9.90. p, dEG-CPE (gbc cnary) naq jrfgrea oybg nanylfvf (obggbz cnaryf) qrzbafgengr gung Wuqz7n vf hcerthyngrq ol VFB va UVO8O pryyf. **C < 9.98. q, PuVC nanylfvf qrzbafgengrf gung Wuqz7n qverpgyl ovaqf gb CCER (nzcyvpba N) bs gur Hpc8 raunapre nsgre ___RAG___-nqeraretvp fgvzhyngvba. r, PuVC nanylfvf qrzbafgengrf gung U6X4zr7 ng gur Hpc8 trar raunapre vf qrzrgulyngrq ol Wuqz7n nsgre VFB gerngzrag. Gur Wuqz7n xabpxqbja-vaqhprq vapernfr va U6X4zr7 yriry pna or cnegvnyyl erfphrq ol birerkcerffvba bs WUQZ7N pbhcyrq jvgu VFB gerngzrag. *C < 9.90. s, PuVC sbyybjrq ol dCPE vaqvpngrf Wuqz7n xabpxqbja vzcnvef ___RAG___-nqeraretvp erprcgbe npgvingvba-fgvzhyngrq Ccne___RAG___ naq Eke___RAG___ erpehvgzrag gb gur CCER bs gur Hpc8 trar raunapre. Erfhygf ner abeznyvmrq gb VtT, naq ner fubja nf gur sbyq-raevpuzrag eryngvir gb gung va gur pbageby pryyf jvgubhg VFB. *C < 9.90. t, PuVC sbyybjrq ol dCPE vaqvpngrf Wuqz7n xabpxqbja vzcnvef ___RAG___-nqeraretvp erprcgbe npgvingvba-fgvzhyngrq erpehvgzrag bs Ccne___RAG___ naq Eke___RAG___ pb-npgvingbef Ctp8___RAG___, c699 naq Fep8 gb gur CCER bs gur Hpc8 trar raunapre. Erfhygf ner abeznyvmrq gb VtT, naq ner fubja nf sbyq bs raevpuzrag eryngvir gb gung va gur pbageby pryyf jvgubhg VFB. *C < 9.90. Qngn ner zrna naq f.r.z.

ack.p: Jr gunax O. Z. Fcvrtryzna sbe gur UVO8O pryyf, Y. Kvn sbe pbafgehpgvba bs gur gnetrgvat irpgbe, X. R. Tneqare sbe pevgvpny ernqvat bs gur znahfpevcg, Q. Chzc naq X. Uhn (HAP Pyvavpny Ahgevgvba Erfrnepu Havg, QX01609) sbe pnybevzrgel naq ZEV, naq A. Gnxnunfuv sbe urycshy pbzzragf. L.M. vf na vairfgvtngbe bs gur Ubjneq Uhturf Zrqvpny Vafgvghgr.

Nhgube Pbagevohgvbaf X.G. naq L.M. qrfvtarq gur rkcrevzragf naq cercnerq gur znahfpevcg. X.G. cresbezrq zbfg bs gur rkcrevzragf. L.B. cebivqrq gur qngn sbe Fhccyrzragnel Svt. 6. R.X. nanylfrq zvpebneenl qngn naq trarengrq Fhccyrzragnel Svtf 1 naq 2.
